name: all-in-one-box-login
author: Ashek Al Mahmud

sections.description:
This is a easy plugin to create your own small form for login. add this plugin and user shortcode [aiob-login]

A few notes about the sections above:

  • Just put shortcode [aiob-login] on page and you’ll get your login page done.
  • From plugin admin panel, you can manage all
  • You can change redirection after login
  • You can change redirection after logout
  • Able to change login error messages
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/aiob-login directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
sections.faq:
How to create this login form

Just create a page and put the [‘aiob-login’] and publish. You’ll get your login form.

short_description: This is a simple login form plugin.
